meanings.definition: A ditch or trench dug as a fortification.
meanings.sent1: The soldiers hid in the foss to protect themselves.
meanings.sent2: The castle had a deep foss surrounding it for defense.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kids played hide-and-seek in the empty foss.
meanings.sent4: The foss was like a moat guarding the ancient fortress.
meanings.sent5: The foss was so wide that no enemy could cross it easily.

meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a large foss of a dinosaur bone.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the foss to learn about prehistoric creatures.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat knocked over the foss replica on the shelf.
meanings.sent4: The foss in the rock layer revealed secrets of the past.
meanings.sent5: The foss found in the desert was perfectly preserved.
